DiagLib_AdcTestParams Struct Reference
ADC Diag Lib

Structure containing input parameters for ADC software test. More...

#include <diagLib_adc.h>

Detailed Description

Structure containing input parameters for ADC software test.

Field Documentation

uint32_t DiagLib_AdcTestParams::baseAddr

Base address of the ADC module

DiagLib_AdcChannelConfig_t DiagLib_AdcTestParams::chCfg[DIAGLIB_ADC_MAX_NUM_CH]

Channel number from which input is given. Refer struct adcChannelConfig_t.

uint32_t DiagLib_AdcTestParams::fifoNum

FIFO to be used to store the data. Refer enum adcFIFONum_t.

uint32_t DiagLib_AdcTestParams::highRange

Maximum value expected after conversion.

uint32_t DiagLib_AdcTestParams::lowRange

Minimum value expected after conversion.

uint32_t DiagLib_AdcTestParams::mode

Mode of Operation. Refer enum adcOperationMode_t.

uint32_t DiagLib_AdcTestParams::numCh

Number of input channels activated.

uint32_t DiagLib_AdcTestParams::numLoop

Number of times to perform conversion before disabling the steps. Set this value to 1 in case of single shot.

uint32_t DiagLib_AdcTestParams::refVltg

Reference Voltage required for conversion. To be given in milliVolts.

uint32_t DiagLib_AdcTestParams::testType

Type of test to perform. Refer enum DiagLib_AdcTestType_t.

uint32_t DiagLib_AdcTestParams::timeout

Choose the timeout value within which polling has to be completed failing which test API returns with a failure. Value to be given in milli seconds.

uint32_t DiagLib_AdcTestParams::transferMode

To choose between interrupt method or polled method. Refer enum DiagLib_AdcTransferMode_t.

uint32_t DiagLib_AdcTestParams::verifyEnable

Set this parameter to TRUE to verify the ADC output with the expected volatge. If set to FALSE, any failure in the converted output comparision will not be reflected in the return.

uint32_t DiagLib_AdcTestParams::vltgDev

Accepted Voltage deviation after conversion. Output voltage can be deviated by +/- vltgDev. To be given in milliVolts. By default this is set to 0mV.
